contextId.information: According to Old Testament law, a woman was ritually unclean during her monthly bleeding. "Jerusalem's sins have made her filthy and unclean, and therefore she was unacceptable before God." (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
contextId.quote: scorned as something that is filthy

contextId.information: "as if they were coming to a feast" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
contextId.quote: as you would call the people to a feast day
